summary: Live scenes of Paris and a continuity Narrator link together four dramatic re-enactments of original ballet creations by Roland Petit and his ensemble, Ballets de Paris: Carmen (1949), La croqueuse de diamants (1950), Deuil en 24 heures (1953), and Cyrano de Bergerac (1959).
cast: Maurice Chevalier|Les Ballets de Paris|Zizi Jeanmaire|Dirk Sanders|Bertie Eckhrat|Raoul Celada|Gerard Lemaitre|Elwin Carel|Hans von Manen|Claude Jourdan|Roland Petit|Moira Shearer|George Reich|Josiane Consoli|Joelle Zissler|Lucien Mars|Léo Lauer|Cyd Charisse|Daniëlle Jesse|Regine Dubry|Josette Clavier|Henning Kronstam|Fredbjørn Bjørnsson|Regine Rourry|Sally Pierce|France Arnel|Irena Radkitwiecz
keywords: narrator introduction|man carries a woman|man hits a woman|man in a closet|man wears a top hat
title: Los ballets de París
